sentences.english: We both had been sitting on the Longquan hill for whole day.
sentences.chinese: 我們倆坐在龍泉山上，整整一天沒有下來。

sentences.english: Plum green glaze is a outstanding celadon glaze originated in Longquan Kiln in Southern Song Dynasty.

sentences.english: North Sung, Lung-chuan is the green porcelain of southern Chinese most to produce a base.

sentences.english: The proposed treatment center of hazardous waste is located on Luodai town Longquanyi District.

sentences.english: Beijing Longquan Monastery is situated in the Phoenix Range Scenic Area, northwest of the Haidian District of Beijing.

sentences.english: Longquan celadon Product sub-daily-use porcelain and ceramic art display two broad categories.

sentences.english: The character of reservoir distribution is mainly strip-shaped or lentoid.

sentences.english: Longquan city is one of many districts that fountain municipality in Zhejiang province geological disaster.

sentences.english: Longquan Rural tourism is an emerging industry.

sentences.english: The article mainly carry out the research on Longquan celadon in Southern Song in four aspects.
sentences.chinese: 論文主要從四個方面對南宋龍泉青瓷進行探究。

sentences.english: Longquan Temple is one of the symbolic humane scenery spots of the tourist zone in Qianshan.
